content: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of other's opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
translations: ita:Il nostro tempo Ã¨ limitato, per cui non lo dobbiamo sprecare vivendo la vita di qualcun altro. Non facciamoci intrappola
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by al_ex_an_der (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
